name: Daisy
explanation: Daisy's ranking is well-rounded, prioritizing essential survival items needed for health and navigation. Water and a first-aid kit are top priorities, which are critical for maintaining hydration and treating any injuries. Sunglasses and lightweight clothing items help protect against the scorching sun, improving our chances of avoiding heatstroke and dehydration. Navigation tools such as the air map and magnetic compass are also ranked reasonably high, crucial for finding our way to the mining camp. Lastly, items with less immediate relevance, like the salt tablets and liquor, are appropriately ranked lower.
